title: Can't patch the game
body: Today I tried logging in and it said it needed admin permissions to access something on my computer. now it wont let me patch and i have tried repairing the client and all i get is this message. http://puu.sh/ssgGy/2cac290af6.jpg i have tried launching the legacy client but that didnt work

replies.body:
Can you try launching the **LeagueClient.exe** file from within your install directory (C:\Riot Games). When you do so, be sure to launch the app as admin (right-click, run as admin). 

Let me know if this worked.
